description: The radical tactics of Elizabeth Cady Stanton, the intellectual leader of the original women's rights movement, anger young suffragists and frustrate her life partner, Susan B. Anthony.
name: Elizabeth Cady Stanton - The First Suffragist

original_info.id: Elizabeth Cady Stanton & Susan B. Anthony_1999
original_info.name: Elizabeth Cady Stanton & Susan B. Anthony
